academic_projects.description: Designed and developed a scalable e-commerce analytics platform using Python, React, and AWS. The platform provided real-time analytics and insights to e-commerce businesses, enabling data-driven decision making.
academic_projects.name: E-Commerce Analytics Platform

academic_projects.description: Developed a healthcare management system using TypeScript, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Docker. The system enabled healthcare providers to manage patient records, schedule appointments, and track medical history.
academic_projects.name: Healthcare Management System

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Systems

summary.body: As a seasoned developer, I excel in collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements, design and develop software solutions, and ensure seamless integration with existing systems. My expertise in full-stack development, cloud computing, and data analytics enables me to deliver innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of businesses.
summary.title: Results-driven Senior Full Stack Developer with 20+ years of experience in designing and developing scalable, efficient, and secure software solutions. Proficient in a range of programming languages, including Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time and on budget. Strong understanding of cloud computing, data analytics, and agile development methodologies.

responsibilities: Designed and developed multiple software applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements
Ensured seamless integration with existing systems and databases
Implemented automated testing and deployment scripts using Jenkins and Docker
Assisted in the development of multiple software applications using Python, React, and AWS
Worked on data analytics and visualization using Python and MongoDB
Collaborated with the development team to identify and prioritize project requirements
Implemented automated testing and deployment scripts using Jenkins and Docker
